#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    long long int t,s,e,n,x,y,i;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld %lld",&s,&e);
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        int flag=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;++i)
        {
            scanf("%lld %lld",&x,&y);
            if(x>=e||y<=s)
                continue;
            else
                flag=1;
        }
        if(flag==0)
            printf("YES\n");
        else
            printf("NO\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
